item.title: Python Script on AWS Lambda
item.description: Step1 select blueprint select “Lambda” from AWS Management Console select “lambda-canary” Step2 configure event sources Event source type: "Scheduled Event" Name: "foobar" Description: "foobar" Schedule: "rate(5 minutes)" Step3 configure function Name: "foobar" Description: "foobar" Runtime: "Python 2.7" function code: "python script" Handler: "lambda_function.lambda_handler" Role: "lambda_basic_execution" Memory(MB): "128" Timeout: "10sec" reference AWS Lambda��Python��Schedule���s������
